name: Elite Care Canada
tag_list: nannies, nanny, caregivers, caregiver, canada, au-pair
overview:
Founded in 2002, Elite Care Canada has built its reputation on providing the highest standards in the industry. With the most diverse range of extraordinary candidates, Elite Care has always recruited selectively and fairly to ensure that every match we make is significant and that our clients can depend on us for finding the best caregivers in the world.

Recruiting from over 80 different countries allows Elite Care to find the languages, skill sets, and training that discerning families demand when looking after the wellbeing of their children. Their program finds only the best then triple-checks them to ensure they are the safest, best choices on the market, while actively avoiding agencies participating in exploitation and coercion.
